Text:
Thank-you very much... 

Anyone out there seen any of Gino's older stuff?  I'm looking for:

1978 Brother to Brother 
1977 A Pauper in Paradise 
1976 The Gist of the Gemini 
1975 Storm at Sunup 
1974 Powerful People 
1973 Crazy Life 

Cheers!

Brother to brother was the fist album I bought of his work. I still own that album, which remains as one of favorites of any album.

Thanks for this one.
